videos.description: South Carolina's PJ Dozier comes from behind to block Missouri's Kevin Puryear.
videos.headline: SC's Dozier gets the block

videos.description: South Carolina's Sindarius Thornwell misses a 3-pointer and Missouri's K.J. Walton goes down court for a lay-up, but Thornwell chases him down to make the block.
videos.headline: Thornwell there with a chasedown block

videos.description: South Carolina's Rakym Felder bounces his shot off the backboard to sink the 3-pointer.
videos.headline: SC's Felder banks in a long 3

videos.description: South Carolina's Sindarius Thornwell drives to the basket and finishes with the one-handed dunk and draws the foul, with the dunk not counting.
videos.headline: Thornwell with the tomahawk dunk

videos.description: South Carolina coach Frank Martin discusses his team's bench play and the win over Tigers.
videos.headline: Martin pleased with team's bench performance

videos.description: Pat Bradley and Mike Morgan break down South Carolina's Sindarius Thornwell's performance against Missouri.
videos.headline: Pat Bradley and Mike Morgan break down Thornwell's play
